agent: Hello, thanks for calling Rivertown insurance customer service. How may I help you?

agent: I'm fine. Thank you. And you?

agent: Well, I can help you with your password reset here but you can also do it yourself on the website.

agent: Yes sir. I'll need your first name and last name to help with your password reset.

agent: S.E.A.N Okay. I'll also be needing your date of birth, phone number and your social security number.

agent: Please bear with us sir. We need this information to help you with your password reset. It'll be over before you know it.

agent: Thank you for your understanding sir. You can go on.

agent: Kindly go on sir.

agent: Your phone number and your social security number sir.

agent: one five two four five.

agent: Five four five two one six.
customer: Yep, that's right.

agent: Okay. one five two four five Five four five two one six, is that correct?

agent: Just a moment sir.

agent: Okay. Can I have your social security number sir?

agent: Sure, please take your time.

agent: Three three Two.

agent: Three five two.

agent: Six one One.
customer: Yep, that's it.

agent: Okay, three three Two There five two six one one is that correct?
customer: sorry, my social security number actually ends with six seven three not Six one One.

agent: okay, you said three three one Three five two six Seven three, is that correct?

agent: Okay, Just a moment please.

agent: Okay. Lastly I'll need you to give an answer to the security question in order to confirm the ownership of this account.

agent: Okay. What's your mother's maiden name?

agent: that's correct.

agent: I was just about to ask that sir. I'm so sorry for the inconvenience. Kindly provided your email address sir.
customer: Jeez, I thought I told you my email address earlier and you still ask me to provide it? What's all these?

agent: I just need to confirm it sir. You said your email address is seanjacksen at gmail dot com. Is that correct?

agent: Just a moment please. I need to verify your email on the system because your reset link will be sent there.

agent: (laughter), the reset link hasn't been sent. I said the reset link will be sent to your email.

customer: Okay. Is that all?

agent: Yes sir, is there anything else I can help you with?
customer: Well, I thought this conversation will be very short. I need to know how to reset my password on the website so that I wouldn't have to call the customer care service again. My wife also needs a password reset. I'll be able to help her with it. Just explain it to me.

agent: Alright sir. It's very easy.
